item.description:
Come join me for a different kind of workout! In Strip Fit we start slow with a warm up that includes belly dance, latin dance, hip hop, and pilates, then really break a sweat learning and rehearsing a fun and flirty chair routine! You'll actually have some fun while getting in shape!

The class is $10 or $90 for a ten pack (can be mixed and matched with Bridget's Hip Hop class)

*This class is for women only*Please arrive 5-10 minutes early if it's your first time at the studio

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
